product_title: Small Kira Leather Convertible Crossbody Bag
product_description: This structured leather crossbody bag is furnished with a pull-through chain strap for shoulder or crossbody carry, while Tory Burch hardware elevates the look.
product_details_and_care:
This structured leather crossbody bag is furnished with a pull-through chain strap for shoulder or crossbody carry, while Tory Burch hardware elevates the look.
Magnetic-snap flap closure
Pull-through chain strap
Exterior slip pocket
Three interior compartments; zip pocket
